## SolidLineMaterial.dashSize property

Size of the dashed segments.

 Ths \[\[gapSize\]\] need to be also set to enable dashed line.  gapSize.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get dashSize(): number;

set dashSize(value: number);
```
